Text.Page:
Okay, I need to know what we're working with before we just send troops marching in there.

I'm going to need you to head over and scout out the main gate of the Sinestral Manor to make sure the area is clear.

Report back here when you've finished that and let me know everything you found.

Not too many guards, but a locked gate, huh? Hmm. That's good and bad news. Getting past the guards should be fine, but the gate...

Well, thank you for that. I'll think on what our next step should be.
